amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. Appropriations made in this Act for the Environmental Protection Agency are hereby reduced by 17 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 80 printed in House Report 114-683 to reduce Appropriations made in this Act for the Environmental Protection Agency by 17 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 239 (Roll no. 456).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 239 (Roll no. 456).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Perry.
